name: Agents & Tools (MCP)
description: Creating agents with personalities and tools.
content:
# Agentic Workflows

## Defining an Agent

```python
from lollms_client import LollmsPersonality

agent = LollmsPersonality(
    name="Researcher",
    system_prompt="You research topics using tools.",
    active_mcps=["search_web", "scrape_website"] # Enable tools
)
```

## Running the Agent

```python
# Initialize with MCP binding
lc = LollmsClient(..., mcp_binding_name="local_mcp")
discussion = LollmsDiscussion.create_new(lc)

# Chat with the specific personality
response = discussion.chat(
    user_message="Find the latest news on AI.",
    personality=agent,
    max_llm_iterations=5 # Allow multiple tool calls
)
```
